name: Jam Banama Challenge
description:
New and improved Jam Banama Challenge game comes!
Enjoy tasty fruit blast effects, and try to solve all the challenging puzzles! Have fun in this amazing fruits splashy adventure. Collect and Clear now!

Features:
- Sweet and delicious fruits
- Over 400 interesting and splashy levels
- Slim size but stunning fruits splash effects
- Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
